attributes.action: ban the use of Mobile Phones, Ipods, MP3 players or similar devices by pedestrians as cyclists on any road that is open to use by motorised vehicles.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In my work as a mini-cab driver i am constantly amazed by pedestrians and cyclists who are putting themselves and others in danger with their inappropriate usage of mobiles, ipods or similar whilst cycling or crossing roads. They have no consideration for other road users or their own safety and should incur fines for such behaviour.
